# Linux CentOS ping域名和curl查询本机外网地址 - 纸上得来终觉浅，绝知此事要躬行 - CSDN博客





2018年10月12日 10:21:50[boonya](https://me.csdn.net/boonya)阅读数：248








### CentOS ping安装

```bash
yum install iputils
```

### CentOS域名异常处理

**异常一：ping异常**

```bash
centos7 ping: www.baidu.com: Name or service not known
```

**异常二：curl 域名异常**
`curl: (6) Could not resolve host: www.baidu.com`


DNS处理方法，修改vi /etc/resolv.conf：

```bash
# Generated by NetworkManager
nameserver 114.114.114.114
nameserver 8.8.8.8
~
```

### CentOs验证本地外网IP

使用curl命令访问公网域名解析地址：

```bash
$ curl ifconfig.me
$ curl icanhazip.com
$ curl ident.me
$ curl ipecho.net/plain
$ curl whatismyip.akamai.com
$ curl tnx.nl/ip
$ curl myip.dnsomatic.com
$ curl ip.appspot.com
$ curl -s checkip.dyndns.org | sed 's/.*IP Address: [0−9\.]∗
```
